roleset.name: cf give

example.name: provide-v: transtive
example.text: This airline provides connecting service between Philly and Newark.
example.arg: connecting service between Philly and Newark.

example.name: provide-v: provide with
example.text: It is providing the new firm with almost $100 million in seed money.
example.arg: with almost $100 million in seed money.

example.name: provide-v: provide to
example.text: Hudson General provides maintenance and other services to airlines and airports

example.name: ARG1
example.text: James Yeh , general manager of the Sunrise Express Travel Service , which specializes in Pacific Island tours , says that the current trend among travelers in Taiwan is for low group fares with lots of entertainment provided .

example.name: provision-n: Light Verb Construction
example.text: So the bank 's board decided to make 1.23 billion Malaysian dollars in provisions for interest payments from loans.

example.name: provision-n: All arguments
example.text: In this paper we attempt to reveal how hospitals alter their provision of care to the poor in a more cost conscious and competitive environment.
example.arg: in a more cost conscious and competitive environment.

roleset.note: PROVIDE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls fulfilling-13.4.1-2. (from provide.01-v)
PROVISION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry provide.01, maps to Vncls fulfilling-13.4.1-2. (from provision.01-n)

roleset.name: provide provisions

example.name: provision-v: only corpus exx are nominal
example.text: Mr. Bowder said the bank's experience with LDC debt has been ``painful'' and this latest move represents the final phase of a program begun seven years ago to reduce its exposure through provisioning, debt sales and debt swaps.

example.name: provision-v: as a verb
example.text: John provisioned Mary's road trip with a quarter-ton of beef jerky and three pints of Gatorade.
example.arg: with a quarter-ton of beef jerky and three pints of Gatorade.

example.name: provisioning-n
example.text: In at least one species of skink in the large genus Trachylepis placental transport accounts for nearly all provisioning of nutrients to embryos before birth .

roleset.note: PROVISION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'provision' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from provision.01-v predicate notes)
PROVISIONING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
